reasoning: Reporting incidence (new diagnoses). Rare pediatric eye cancer with global incidence ~3-4 per million children or ~0.4 per 100k total population. Data from cancer registries and IARC.
source: Kivela T (1999). The epidemiological challenge of the most frequent eye cancer: retinoblastoma, an issue of birth and death. Br J Ophthalmol. 83(7):767-73
